topic.title: Donate to YouTube
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN/
-
YouTube is entirely supported by the general public.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-
Bitcoin
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bitcoin is a secure and anonymous digital currency. Bitcoins cannot be easily tracked back to you, and are safer and faster alternative to other donation methods. You can send BTC to the following address:
-
------------------------------------------------------------------------
1HZxDC8bVmqFyseQmo1zPtSDYB4aBsQu2i
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-
Various sites offer a service to exchange other currency to/from Bitcoins. There are also services allowing trades of goods for Bitcoins. Bitcoins are not subject to central regulations and are still gaining value. To learn more about Bitcoins, visit the website (https://bitcoin.org) or read more on YouTube.
-
For a more private transaction, you can click on the refresh button above to generate a new address
-
Litecoin
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Simillar to Bitcoin, Litecoin offers very fast and secure transactions worldwide, and there are many exchanges allowing you to trade for Litecoins.
-
Litecoin users may choose to donate to us at:
-
------------------------------------------------------------------------
LXGJBNPbKSo9tevbVwyrguRN8PdEsvM44D
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-
To learn more about Litecoin, visit the official website at https://www.litecoin.org or read more on YouTube.
-
ZCash
------------------------------------------------------------------------
ZCash is a cryptocurrency that offers privacy and selective transparency of transactions. ZCash payments are published on a public blockchain, but the sender, recipient, and amount of a transaction may remain private.
-
ZCash users may choose to donate to us at:
-
------------------------------------------------------------------------
t1WxsZtRCxaLAuJ9zsJnD4TX183SYoJ4sZ9
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-
To learn more about ZCash, visit the official website at https://z.cash or read more on YouTube.
-
Monero
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Monero is an open-source cryptocurrency that focuses on privacy, decentralisation and scalability. Unlike many cryptocurrencies that are derivatives of Bitcoin, Monero is based on the CryptoNote protocol and possesses significant algorithmic differences relating to blockchain obfuscation.
-
Monero users may choose to donate to us at:
-
------------------------------------------------------------------------
4JUdGzvrMFDWrUUwY3toJATSeNwjn54LkCnKBPRzDuhzi5vSepHfUckJNxRL2gjkNrSqtCoRUrEDAgRwsQvVCjZbS1XwGb32ENc2gM5gw7
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-
To learn more about Monero, visit the official website at https://getmonero.org or read more on YouTube
Additional cryptocurrency options to be announced.

1512912701_149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCU.body: Thanks for your feedback, htgozn, I'm confident I'll think of something.

zerotube, nekololi, i just copied the text from the wikileaks
https://shop.wikileaks.org/donate

Please, don't take offense kopyjane.
i will share with you.
Unfortunately, I cannot often look after the project.
I'm going to make a full copy of the YouTube,  and then I'll start creating Google ZeroNet.

> [htgozn](#comment_9_1J58Rie679DVSuKB1iDyFFTbzmaMaY2bt2): YouTube

Anyone can create a channel with porn on YouTube.
I do not forbid you to do this. (｡◕‿◕｡)
I think that users can earn money on their channels, perhaps I'm implementing a banner system.

> [buizel](#comment_11_1NVRQ533fwKrZaRyP8joH2kk6gis2G7PVp): Yeah but there has to be something on ZeroNet to be attractive to advertises.

I think that the future network will be very steep.

> [buizel](#comment_12_1NVRQ533fwKrZaRyP8joH2kk6gis2G7PVp): Yeah but it's something worth trying for or waiting for.

We must do everything as quickly as possible.

> [darkshroud](#comment_17_1BQaDuyXqze4tNXucqvbz3yUVkysxCoeni): You should have named it ZeroTube. [...]

YouTube will be similar to the original YouTube in the light of the concept of decentralization.
The name does not change.
